definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Ju Jdg 16:9 cord, thread (twisted);—abs. ´[[פ]] Nu 19:15; cstr. [[פְּתִיל]] Ju Jdg 16:9 +; sf. [[פְּתִילְֶָ]] Ge 38:18; pl. [[פְּתִילִים]] v:Ge 38:25, [[פְּתִילִם]] Ex 39:3; —cord (from which seal was hung) Ge 38:18, Ge 38:25(J), ´[[פ]] [[נְרְֶׂת]] Ju Jdg 16:9 (sim.), [[פִּשְׁתִּים]] ´[[פ]] Ez Eze 40:3 (as measuring line); [[תְּכֵלֶת]] ´[[פ]], for fastening, Ex 28:28, Ex 28:37, Ex 39:21, Ex 39:31, Nu 15:38, cf. [[פָּתִיל]] alone Nu 19:15 (perh. gloss, v. Di); threads (of gold) in ephod Ex 39:3 (all P).
